remarks: A deduction unionizing a non-unionized collection of virtual hypotheses.  Commuted version of ~ 3impdir .  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 4-Feb-2017.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
3impdirp1.1 $e |- ( ( ( ch /\ ps ) /\ ( ph /\ ps ) ) -> th ) $.
3impdirp1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ ch /\ ps ) -> th ) $.
